  3. Hyewon

Hyewon

Korean: 혜원

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Shin Hye-won
Native name:
신혜원
Birthday:
Oct 5, 2005
Age:
19 years old

Introduction

Hyewon is a South Korean trainee under Belift Lab. She was a member of the kids girl group Little Cheer Girl.

In 2023, she appeared as a contestant of the Hybe's survival show, R U Next. She was eliminated in episode 7 after ranking 14th place.
